user_question: How does 5G technology improve remote surgery capabilities, and can you generate an image of a futuristic remote surgery setup?
final_answer: 5G technology improves remote surgery capabilities by providing ultra-low latency, high reliability, and massive connectivity, enabling real-time data transmission and precise control. Image of a futuristic remote surgery setup generated. Edge computing reduces latency by processing data closer to the source, ensuring faster response times and improved reliability.
